title: Public Health Foundational Curriculum Based on Cultural Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Includes culture-specific health issue analysis activities centered on local community cases to maximize learner engagement.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze health needs of culturally diverse groups and explain at least three cultural characteristics.
Learners can propose solutions to scenario-based problems using 20 basic public health terminology.
Learners can create public health campaign proposals incorporating peer feedback via digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
